recipetext.li: Crack the eggs and divide the yolks and whites. Whisk the egg yolks with the milk.
Mix all the dry ingredients and sift them in egg and milk mixture. Beat until smooth.
Hard-wipe the egg whites and gently turn into the batter. Let swell for half an hour.
Fry the pancakes of about 10-12 cm in diameter on a low heat until they become thick and airy.
Serve with fresh berries and maple syrup. Sprinkle with a bit sugar if you want.
Mix bread and cream. Let swell.
Add the mince beef, onion, eggs, salt, pepper and nutmeg and stir until smooth.
Roll into small buns, the smaller the better, and fry in butter.
Serve with mashed potatoes, lingon sauce and possibly cream sauce.
